org.canova.image.loader

Class NativeImageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.canova.image.loader.BaseImageLoader
      • org.canova.image.loader.NativeImageLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CifarLoader

    public class NativeImageLoader
extends BaseImageLoader
    Uses JavaCV to load images.
    See Also:
